result.execSummary:
The defendant Cheyenne A. Raymond was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Conditions:  

Attend, pay for and successfully complete an anger management course and any other assessments/treatment as recommended by agent.

Follow all rules of probation.

Pay court costs and costs of supervision without the DNA surcharge.  Costs to include a $60 service repayment fee (for Crawford County service paid for by the Richland County DA). 

Court orders Defendant to submit to booking/printing at the Richland County Sheriff's Department before leaving the courthouse for sign up for probation.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cheyenne A. Raymond

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Cheyenne A. Raymond in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  14CM181/status and 15CM11/initial.  Counsel advise the court that they have reached an agreement for resolution of these matters.  DA Harper states def will be pleading to bail jumping charge in 15CM11 for dismissal/read in of 14CM181.  Def pleads guilty to bail jumping in 15CM11.  Court's colloquy on plea.  Finding of guilty.  DA has asked for 12 mo probation with anger management, assts/treatment as recommended, and $60 service fee for fees incurred by Richland County DA for service by Crawford County.  DA asks for printing/booking - no ATN info.  Atty. M addresses the Court.  

Sentence:  Withheld for 12 mo probation.  Conditions:  anger mgt; attend, pay for, succ. complete that and any other assessments and treatment as recommended; follow rules of probation; pay costs without DNA surcharge; pay $60 service fee (for Crawford County service paid for by the Richland County DA).  Court orders def to submit to booking/printing at RCSD before leaving the courthouse for sign up at probation.
